title: Pantheon OR Karthus?
body: I've been wasting IP on random champ shards, so I recently saved up to 3500 IP. I was wondering if I should get Pantheon or Karthus.

replies.body: Press R, he's a nightmare once you're good at him

> [{quoted}](name=Leo1024,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=fvFt9gEO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-30T19:59:40.701+0000)
>
> Press R, he's a nightmare once you're good at him

Gud idea.
